name: py-pycodestyle

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
pycodestyle is a tool to check your Python code against some of the
style conventions in PEP 8. Note: formerly called pep8.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-avro-python3
dependent_to.description:
Apache Avro is a data serialization system. Note: lang/py3 version (this
package) will be deprecated and lang/py functions will be made available
for both python2 and python3.

dependent_to.name: py-flake8-import-order
dependent_to.description: Flake8 and pylama plugin that checks the ordering of import statements.

dependent_to.name: py-autopep8
dependent_to.description:
autopep8 automatically formats Python code to conform to the PEP 8 style
guide.

dependent_to.name: py-flake8
dependent_to.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
